Account Information Sign Up Provide your salon information Information about recruitment and salon Spa/Salon name Address Contact phone number Login phone number Enter your Salon's description Type price Add + Add Type phone number Add Staff For Salon Add Service For Salon Sign Up successfully! Please wait for administrator approval. Once your account is approved, we’ll notify you via the app During the review period, you can still log in to edit salon information, add services and add staff, and receive approval notifications from the admin. However, your salon will not appear in the list of 123 Viet Nails that customers can see, and will not receive bookings from customers. TO REGISTER YOUR NEW SALON Notice Your timezone has changed from %s to %s Please check your business hour before saving information! Your salon is in the time zone %s based on your Salon Address.
Please check your business hour before saving information! Pay %s$ Free The shop owner manually adds the shop's service and staff information Add service and staff photos Add your salon photos Your salon doesn't have any services yet Your salon doesn't have any reports yet Your salon doesn't have any customer yet Enter voucher Enter Code Enter Value Percent Select Customer Type All Normal Vip Voucher Add Voucher Happening Upcoming Expired Newly created (You've just created this voucher save salon for release it) Price must greater than 0 Salon has not been approved so cannot use this feature. Please wait until the salon is approved. Notification If you do not have time to register or do not know how to register, please click here to send a picture of your "Business card", our customer service representative will contact you to help you register quickly Please send us your business card (if you do not have it, please let us know your email or phone number, a staff member will contact you to support and register to help you quickly. If you do not have a business card, please leave your phone number or email so we can contact you. Add your business card images Take 5 minutes to register yourself in just 5 easy steps by Click here to let us help you Or Click here to sign up Create Login
Information Add Salon
Information Add Detail
Information (more) Add Business
Hours Add Services And
Staff Easy sign up with only 5 steps Create login information Provide more information of the salon Provide salon business hour If there is no input time, you can press the skip button and add later Please provide a description of the salon The more detailed the description, the more information customers will have about your salon and the easier it will be for customers to book services at your salon. Adding more pictures helps the salon become more attractive to attract more customers to order services at the salon. The salon owner needs to provide the salon business hour for customers to consult and book an appointment. Provide service and worker information Salon owners need to provide information about available services and worker information for customers to consult and order salon services. You can add your own by 
clicking here To add a service please enter the service name, enter the price ($), select the service image and press the add button. To add a staff, please enter the staff name, enter the phone number, select the staff photo and press the add button. Staffs need to check-in before the Salon can receive service orders and serve customers Staffs can check-in during the salon's operating hours Staffs will automatically check-out when the salon's operating hours are over If you have any questions or would like assistance don\’t hesitate to get in touch with us for help Hotline support Submit Submit a request for registration support Back Click to select photo Click to select service photo Click to select staff avatar Click here to upload your business card Enter service name (example: Full set) Enter price Enter staff name Thank you for submitting your registration request, our staff will contact you to assist you with registration as soon as possible. Copy to other day Now you can add service and staff manually Search Developed by Add New Customer Create New Customer Cancel to navigate immediately Automatically redirect to customer login page in List of job seekers Additional services ( if any ) My recruitment ads Choose working time Part time Full time Weeks Enter the number of weeks Enter the number of years Choose position Manager Master Assistant manicurist Average income Average income Enter salary / Week Other positions Ads content In addition to the above information, owners can enter other requirements, such as: "The shop needs to recruit talented, honest, hardworking, can OT, .." This resume does not exist or has been hidden. Please login to see this content. If you don't already have an account, create one now to take advantage of many of our free services. The signup process is quick and easy. Are you a salon owner who wants to register to open a Salon?? Are you a nail manicurist looking for a job? Click here to register My CV You are looking forward to… 1. Getting a job quickly and conveniently 2. Finding a job that matches your abilities 3. Your profile is known by many salons Let's create yourself a CV with simple steps that only take a few minutes so we can help you get the most suitable job right away! Create CV now Display my CV Years of Experience About me You should select your gender! Please upload a photo of yourself, the beautiful nail designs you have done, your certificates or degrees Tips: Posting as many photos as you can will help your profile stand out more and easily attract the salon owner. Upload Name Enter your Name Contact Number Local Position or Willing to Relocate? In addition to the information above, please describe yourself in more detail here.
